EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Event_Government Executive Roundtable Canberra_Q115.Post Event Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending the Executive Luncheon Series: Government
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for attending Pivotal's Executive Luncheon on April 30th. We hope you enjoyed the event.
Below are some resources that you might find interesting:
- A whitepaper by Capgemini and Pivotal - Creating the Foundations for the Internet of Things <http://www.capgemini.com/resource-file-access/resource/pdf/creating_the_foundations_for_the_internet_of_things.pdf> - A video <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ka9RSCPRujE> on Big Data vs Climate Change - An animated infographic on building the Business Data <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P1-wlKfBbQE> Lake
If you would like more information about today's content, please contact us at pivotal.io <http://pivotal.io/>.
Thanks, The Pivotal Team
